artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Takenouchi Magohachi
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 246, horizontal ōban #28.7
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
Poem: Omou sono/ akatsuki chigiru/ hajime zo to/ matsu kiku Mii no/ iriai no kane
思ふその　暁ちきる　はしめそと　まつきく三井の　入あいのかね
markings:
Censor:kiwame
Publisher:Take
unknown seal on the lower right corner
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Eight Views of Ōmi (Ōmi hakkei no uchi 近江八景之内)
title: Evening Bell at Mii-dera Temple
